Business Aviation Newsletter: May 2015 Honeywell Sponsors Connected Aircraft Summit <http://aerospace.honeywell.com/news/honeywell-sponsors-connected-aircraft-summit>
The future of the connected aircraft was on the agenda for the second annual Global Connected Aircraft Summit <http://www.gcasummit.com/>, June 8-10, in Chantilly,...
